effects.display_string: Set: Each time you take damage you have a chance to activate Luck of the Draw! causing you to cast Guardian of Ancient Kings for 4.0 sec. Your damage done is increased by 15% for 10 sec after Luck of the Draw! activates.
Set: While you have  Luck of the Draw! Shield of the Righteous refunds 1-3 Holy Power and extends the duration of  Luck of the Draw! by 0.5 sec, up to 10 sec.

spells.description: Equip: Add an energy core to the container for every enemy slain, up to a maximum of 20.

Use: Consume all stored energy cores to send a surge of restorative energy through you, instantly healing you for 2.1 million, with an additional 90,741 healing over 10 seconds for each core consumed.  (1 Min 30 Sec Cooldown)

Use: Push the Big Red Button, launching a missile barrage which deals 1.4 million Fire damage split among all enemies in the area. Deals increased damage when striking multiple targets. (2 Min Cooldown)
Equip: You champion the causes of your guild.  All guild reputation gains are increased by 100%.
